confirm.text: Did the motor jog two times ?

col1.content: Press button to set motor in programming mode for limit settings and checking the motor move direction.
Send a down or up command and check whether the blind moves in the correct direction.
IMPORTANT: No limits are set. You can damage the blind when the motor keeps running up or downwards.
Use the buttons to move the blind. Stop the blind by pressing any button while the blind is moving.
Motor moved in the CORRECT direction
Motor moved in the WRONG direction
Press button to reverse the motor direction.
Use the buttons to move the blind to the desired top position.
save as top position
Press button to set motor in programming mode for limit settings and checking the motor move direction.
Use the buttons to move the blind to the desired BOTTOM position.
save as BOTTOM position

confirm.text: Did the motor move to the top?

col1.content: Move the blind to check whether top and bottom positions are correct.
Positions are correct. Program a new blind.
Positions are NOT correct.
Skip setting TOP limit.
Press button to set motor in programming mode for TOP limit setting.
Use the buttons to move the blind to the desired TOP position.
save as top position
Skip setting BOTTOM limit.
Press button to set motor in programming mode for BOTTOM limit setting.
Use the buttons to move the blind to the desired BOTTOM position.
save as BOTTOM position

confirm.text: Did the motor move to the top?

col1.content: This will reset the motor and reprogram it as a roller blind. The motor should jog two times

confirm.text: After 5 seconds: Did the motor jog two times ?

col1.content: Press button to set motor in programming mode for limit settings and checking the motor move direction.
Move up or down. Check blind movement.
IMPORTANT: No limits are set. Stop motor manually!
Use the buttons to move the blind. Stop the blind by pressing the same button while the blind is moving.
Direction OK
Direction not OK
Press button to reverse the motor direction.
Move the blind to the desired top position.
save as top position
Use the buttons to move the blind to the desired BOTTOM position.
save as BOTTOM position

confirm.text: Did the motor move to the top?

col1.content: Use the buttons to move the blind to the desired SLAT OPEN position.
save as SLAT OPEN position

save as top position

Press button to set motor in programming mode for BOTTOM limit setting.
Use the buttons to move the blind to the desired BOTTOM position.
save as BOTTOM position
